Class tripleplay.game.ScreenSpace.Screen

Changed from non-abstract to abstract.

Changed Constructors
ScreenSpace.Screen(Game) Change in type from void to Game.
  
 

Removed Methods
void destroy() Called when this screen is removed from the screen space.
float height() Returns the height of this screen, for use by transitions.
void paint(Clock) Called once per game paint to allow this screen to participate in the game loop.
void update(int) called once per game update to allow this screen to participate in the game loop.
float width() Returns the width of this screen, for use by transitions.
 

Added Methods
void closeOnSleep(AutoCloseable) Adds {@code ac} to a list of closeables which will be closed when this screen goes to sleep.
void dispose() Called when this screen is removed from the screen space.
IDimension size() Returns the size of this screen, for use by transitions.
String toString()  
 

Added Fields
Signal<Clock> paint A signal emitted on every frame, while this screen is showing.
Signal<Clock> update A signal emitted on every simulation update, while this screen is showing.
 

Changed Fields
